title: Court eFiling Insights
description: Analyzed rejection vs success rates from Jan 2024 onward; built dashboards to spotlight top documents and reasons.

title: Stripe Onboarding Monitor
description: Documented and visualized Stripe onboarding states; proposed improved UX for error handling and status refresh.

title: Splunk Error Explorer
description: Queried API error logs and built actionable reports to reduce noisy failures across services.
